course_title: Seminar: Medieval Art/Architect: Medieval Stained Glass
class_notes: "The Luminous Image: investigating medieval stained glass"
course_description: Advanced seminar on Medieval art and/or architecture with emphasis on critical texts, methods, and techniques of art historical investigation. For art history majors; open to others with permission from the instructor.
sections: Class Nbr: 2935, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 1-3:45p, Instructor: E. Pastan, Status: Open
